job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: Angi is the home for everything home From repairs and renovations to products and financing Angi is transforming every touch point in home services With over 25 years of experience and a network of nearly 250000 pros we have helped more than 150 million people with their home needs Our products and technology help our customers love where they live while helping small businesses grow and thrive We believe the home is the most important place on earth and we are at the beginning of our ambitious journey to redefine how people care for their homes  join usbrbrstrongAbout the rolebrstrongThe Data Analyst is responsible for maintaining improving and creating tools and processes to be used by the Angis Client Success and Sales Originations teams This role will sit in our Indianapolis IN headquartersbrbrstrongWhat youll dobrbrstrongul liPrepare organizational sales reports charts and graphs in support of the sales departmentli liWork directly with sales and leadership to set reporting requirements for their needsli liCollect and analyze data from multiple databases including Microsoft excel SQL and Salesforcecom and additional sources to evaluate current and historical trends dailyli liCreate various reports for internal departmentsli liProactive monitoring data within CRMli liMaintain and execute daily and biweekly responsibilitiesli liLead by example maintaining a positive cooperative attitude especially in times of changechallengeli liPerform related duties as required or assignedli brulstrongWho you arebrbrstrongul liPossess a Bachelors degree or better in Finance Business Analytics Economics or a related field is preferredli liHave previous business analyst experience preferredli liHave strong experience with MS Office particularly Excel li liHave working knowledge of Salesforce and SQL is a plusli liHave the ability to effectively communicate orally and in writing with coworkers management team other Departments vendors and outside agencies including being sensitive to professional ethicsli liHave the ability to work in a metric driven environment and remain goal orientedli liPosses skills in complex problem solving judgment critical thinking and decision makingli liHighly organized with an emphasis on accuracy and timeliness and have attention to detail to accurately follow proceduresli liAbility to maintain selfmotivation and work alone with minimum supervision and with others in a team environment occasionally under time pressure and on several tasks at the same timeli liHave the ability to sit the entire work day viewing a computer monitorli liHave the ability to work occasionally more than 40 hours a week evenings and weekends to meet deadlinesli brulstrongCompensation amp Benefitsbrbrstrongul liThis position will be eligible for a competitive year end performance bonus amp equity package li liFull medical dental vision package to fit your needs li liFlexible vacation policy work hard and take time when you need it li liPet discount plans amp retirement plan with company match 401K li liThe rare opportunity to work with sharp motivated teammates solving some of the most unique challenges and changing the worldliul
